csw.services.logging.appenders

Class FileAppenderHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • csw.services.logging.appenders.FileAppenderHelper

  • public class FileAppenderHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for writing log messages to a file on local disk

    param: path path where the log file will be created param: category category of the log messages
